# Get set up with R

You can find information on getting set up with R [here](https://osu-codeclub.github.io/pages/setup.html). Please do this **before** the workshop.

# Using Posit Cloud

Having trouble day-of getting R/RStudio to work? You can try using RStudio through [Posit Cloud](https://posit.cloud/).

Click "get started"
![](img/posit-cloud.png)

<br>
Select "Learn more" under "Cloud Free"
![](img/cloud-free.png)

<br>
[Sign up for Cloud Free](https://login.posit.cloud/register?redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fclient.login.posit.cloud%2Foauth%2Flogin%3Fshow_auth%3D0%26show_login%3D0) by creating an account, or signing in with Google, GitHub, or Clever.
<br>

Create a New Project > New RStudio Project
![](img/new-project.png)

<br>
Use R through RStudio!

![](img/using-rstudio.png)
